pr_title: Add comment and remove not required filtering

timeline.bodyText:
Oracle's DATE and Oracle's  TIMESTAMP are different types
are you referring to Presto's DATE and Presto's TIMESTAMP?
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: We have mapped Oracle's DATE to Presto's TIMESTAMP. So coercion of TIMESTAMP into DATE during insertion won't actually lead to a coercion being performed I think. See https://github.com/prestosql/presto/blob/master/presto-oracle/src/test/java/io/prestosql/plugin/oracle/OracleDataTypes.java#L223-L228.
replies.author: hashhar
findepi

replies.bodyText: Makes sense. I also don't see any way to re-implement without changing the type mapping (for no gains apart from this test).
replies.author: hashhar

timeline.message: Add comment and remove not required filtering
